remark.ch: 課程名稱：電化學能源系統，建議先修課程：熱力學

goal.en: The objective of this course to systematically introduce electrochemical energy systems, in order to let students understand the catagories, applications, current status, working principles, system components, analysis methods, fundamentals, and other related subjects of electrochemical energy systems.
goal.ch: 本課程之目的乃對於電化學能源系統作系統性、深入而淺出的介紹，以期學生能瞭解電化學能源系統之現有種類、應用領域、技術現況、工作原理、系統組成、分析方法與理論基礎能有基本的認識，同時對於電化學能源系統之相關技術都能有基本的了解。

content.en:
1.Reviews of Electrochemical Energy Systems；
2.Introduction and Overview of Electrochemistry；
3.Components of Electrochemical Systems；
4.Potentials and Thermodynamics of Cells；
5.Kinetics of Electrode Reactions (2 weeks)；
6.Mass Transfer in Electrochemistry；
7.Polarization Phenomena；
8.Basic Potential Step Methods；
9.Linear Sweep Voltammetry；
10.Cyclic Voltammetry；
11.Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy；
12.Equivalent Circuit Fitting；
13.Special Topics about Electrochemical Energy Systems；
content.ch:
1.Reviews of Electrochemical Energy Systems；
2.Introduction and Overview of Electrochemistry；
3.Components of Electrochemical Systems；
4.Potentials and Thermodynamics of Cells；

9.Linear Sweep Voltammetry；
10.Cyclic Voltammetry；
11.Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy；
12.Equivalent Circuit Fitting；
13.Special Topics about Electrochemical Energy Systems；

textbook.en: 1. Provided by lecturer 2. Electrochemical Methods-Fundamentals and Applications, 3rd ed. / Allen J. Bard, Larry R. Faulkner, Henry S. White / Wiley/ 2022. 3. Impedance Spectroscopy Theory, Experiment, and Applications, 2nd ed. / Evgenil Barsoukov, J. Ross Macdonald / Wiley/ 2005. 4. Fuel Cell Systems Explained, 3rd ed. / Andrew L. Dicks, David A. J. Rand / Wiley/ 2018.
textbook.ch: 1. 自編講義 2. Electrochemical Methods-Fundamentals and Applications, 3rd ed. / Allen J. Bard, Larry R. Faulkner, Henry S. White / Wiley/ 2022. 3. Impedance Spectroscopy Theory, Experiment, and Applications, 2nd ed. / Evgenil Barsoukov, J. Ross Macdonald / Wiley/ 2005. 4. Fuel Cell Systems Explained, 3rd ed. / Andrew L. Dicks, David A. J. Rand / Wiley/ 2018.

grading.en: 1. Midterm#1 25％ 2. Midterm#2 25％ 3. Final report(Oral+paper) 30％ 4. Assignemnt 10％ 5. Attendance 10％
grading.ch: 1. 期中考#1 25％ 2. 期中考#2 25％ 3. 期末報告(口頭+書面) 30％ 4. 作業(2-5次) 10％ 5. 出席紀錄與課堂參與 10％

en: Department:Department of Mechanical Engineering only.Year:Third Year、Fourth Year only.

Department:MSc in Mechanical Engineering、Master Program in Opto-Mechatronics Engineering, Department of Mechanical Engineering、MSc in Energy Engineering、PhD in Mechanical Engineering、MSc in Opto-Mechatronics Engineering、PhD in Energy Engineering only.
ch: 系所:限機械工程學系。年級:限三年級、四年級。
系所:限機械工程學系碩士班、機械工程學系光機電工程碩士班、能源工程研究所碩士班、機械工程學系博士班、機械工程學系光機電工程博士班、能源工程研究所博士班。
